description: System code identifying the unit of measure used on parts, fluids, work orders, and transactions.
Human-readable name for the unit of measure corresponding to the code.
Legacy CIMPRO unit-of-measure mapping used for integrations; likely a code from an external or retired system—confirm with SME.
Alternate unit of measure associated for conversions or display; likely stores the code of a compatible unit—confirm with SME.
Second alternate unit of measure available for conversions when multiple equivalents exist—confirm with SME.
User identifier that created this unit-of-measure record.
Timestamp when the record was created in the system.
User identifier that last modified this record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
